    GoalStretch
    The GoalStretch class represents the goal stretch in the game (each player has their own strip of tiles) that the pieces have to go through to reach the goal.

    Methods in org.group7.model.entities.piece with parameters of type IMoveHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    FieldState.handleCollision(Piece p, IMoveHandler handler)
    The handleCollision function calls the addPiece method of the handler object, handlnig collisions with both pieces of the same color and pieces of different colors.
    void
    GoalStretchState.handleCollision(Piece p, IMoveHandler handler)
    The handleCollision function calls the addPiece method of the handler object, passing in the piece's position + 1 modulo the number of outer tiles.
    void
    PieceState.handleCollision(Piece p, IMoveHandler handler)
    The handleCollision function shold use the handler object to place the piece on the appropriate tile and handle any potential collisions.
    void
